channel.title: vision on DeepCourse
channel.description: Recent content in vision on DeepCourse

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to this course on Deep Learning for Computer Vision! This course will teach you the fundamentals of Deep Learning applied to images. Each topic will be covered under three different type of materials: Lessons, such as this one, accompanied with slides and small quizzes between chapters; Practices, with Google Colab notebooks where we will code actual algorithms; And, quizzes, where you will test your recall on the important notions.
